00031 void Window :: windowHamming (short int * insignal, long N, long startIndex, short int * outsignal) {
00032     long i;
00033 
00034     for (i = 0; i < N; i ++)
00035     {
00036         // apply filter from lookup table generated by windowHammingUpdateTable
00037         outsignal [i] = (short int) (double (insignal [i + startIndex]) * hammingTable [i]);
00038     }
00039 }
00040 
00046 void Window :: windowHammingUpdateTable (long N) {
00047     hammingTable = (double *) calloc (N, sizeof (double));
00048     for (long i = 0; i < N; i ++)
00049     {
00050         // generate hamming window coefficients using the formula
00051         hammingTable [i] = 0.54 - 0.46 * cos (TWOPI * double (i) / double (N - 1));
00052     }
00053 }
